question: How the recruitment of the army was conducted during the time of Ranjit Singh?
option1: It was mandatory for all people of age group 20 to 40
option2: Mainly armies were chosen by conducting Horse racing
option3: Joning army was totally voluntary in nature
option4: Government had the power to select anyone in the army forcefully
answer: Joning army was totally voluntary in nature
explanation: Joining the army was totally voluntary in nature during the reign of Ranjit Singh. A lot of people wanted to be a part of the army as joining the army was considered a prestigious job at that time.
